function.name: KeepMax
function.desc: Keep the value of the N max in the input matrix. Every other value are set to 0

function.name: KeepMin
function.desc: Keep the value of the N min in the input matrix. Every other value are set to 0

function.name: ActToPop

input.name: activity
input.desc: Scalar activity to discretized. Value should be in [0;1]

function.desc: Discretized scalar activity into a 1D field [ROW or COL].

function.name: VActToPop

input.name: activities
input.desc: Scalar activities to discretized.Each value should be in [0;1]. Activities is a Vector [ROW or COL].

function.desc: Discretize scalar activities into a Matrix. If activities is ROW Vector, each scalar is discretized on a ROW of the output matrix. If activities is COL Vector, each scalar is discretized on a COL of the output matrix.

function.name: PopToAct

input.name: population
input.desc: Population field to convert into activity.[convert the index of the max coeff into a scalar, if there are more than one max, take the first one]

function.desc: Convert population into a scalar activity. [row/col projection is choosen according to the dimension of output. if output is a ROW Vector : col projection, if output is a COL Vector : row projection]

function.name: PopToVAct

input.name: population
input.desc: Population field to convert into activities.[For each Rows (or cols), convert the index of the max coeff into a scalar, if there are more than one max, take the first one]

function.desc: Convert population into a vector of scalar activities. [row/col projection is choosen according to the dimension of output. if output is a ROW Vector : col projection, if output is a COL Vector : row projection]

function.name: Shift
function.desc: Shift operator : move the activities of the input field with an offset given by the position of the max coefficient in mask field.

function.name: ShiftInv
function.desc: Shift^-1 operator : move the activities of the input field with an offset given by the position of the max coefficient in mask field.
